app.name: UltraContext
app.one_liner: A context engineering API that enables automatic versioning, time-travel, and real-time collaboration across AI agents.

screens.name: Dashboard
screens.purpose: Display real-time agent contexts, enable switching between agents, and support collaboration across teams.
primary_actions: Switch or continue from another agent's context

rust_commands.name: save_item
rust_commands.purpose: Persist a new context item or append to an existing one from an agent integration like OpenClaw.

mvp_plan: week 1: Build basic dashboard UI for viewing contexts
week 1: Enable context sharing and switching
week 1: Implement core context ingestion from agents
acceptance_tests: Contexts captured from any agent are immediately visible across all team members.
User can install UltraContext SDK and see contexts appear in dashboard within one line of code.
